quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.
author: Marie Curie

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: This too shall pass.
author: Persian Proverb

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Wherever you are, be all there.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: The present moment is the only moment available to us.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Do not anticipate trouble, or worry about what may never happen.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Peace begins with a smile.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
author: Jean de La Bruyère

quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Stars can’t shine without darkness.
author: Unknown

quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
author: Seneca

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Every adversity carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C. S. Lewis
